name: Elphidran

aura.name: amicable_holy_dragon
aura.description:
Can be ridden as a flying mount.
 While fighting together, Dark Pals drop more items when defeated.

description: It possesses a demeanor as pure as its appearance suggests. Perhaps because of this, it is sometimes unable to discern good from evil, often allowing wrongdoers to take advantage of it.

skills.name: dragon_cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: dragon_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: flare_arrow
skills.description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

skills.name: mystic_whirlwind
skills.description: Elphidran's exclusive skill. Generates twin whirlwinds imbued with a mysterious power that pursues enemies.

skills.name: draconic_breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.

skills.name: dragon_meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
